insert.name: insert
insert.summary: Inserts an event for the given staff id

update.name: update
update.summary: Updates a planning row and, if necessary, the linked event

delete.name: delete
delete.summary: Deletes a planning row and the linked event

get_all.name: get_all
get_all.summary: Gets all events of a period.

get_all_by_alias.name: get_all_by_alias
get_all_by_alias.summary: Gets all events of a period.

analyze.name: analyze
analyze.summary: Analyzes an events list and returns it.

is_available.name: is_available
is_available.summary: Checks if the staff is available on the given period

is_replaced.name: is_replaced
is_replaced.summary: Checks if the staff event is replaced on the given day
